question: my father  76 yrs...had a minor heart attack 3 yrs back n suffers from high bp.otherwise he is an active person n doesnt hv diabetes..recently after a bout of  vomits hes been told tht he has elevated bilirubin 1.4///sgot 68///sgpt 108 n tlc 13000. though he been put on sm 10 days medication n go off oil n sweets completely....pls help me understand his condition...thanks.
title: elevated sgpt n bilirubin
